FuncDef: The display arp vpn-instance command displays the ARP entries of a VPN instance. The display arp vpn-instance command displays the ARP entries of a VPN instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the ARP entries of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31.

ExtraInfo: To check ARP entries or locate ARP faults of a specified VPN instance, run the display arp vpn-instance command.
